behavior.name: Steering Calibration
behavior.author: Achim Stein
behavior.description: Calibrates the steering motion necessary for the first DRC finals task (driving)

param.name: angle_increment
param.label: angle_increment
param.hint: Distance between two measurement points (in degrees)

param.name: save_path
param.label: save_path
param.hint: Save path relative to target ROS package

param.name: hand_side
param.label: hand_side
param.hint: Which hand is used for steering (left / right)

param.name: save_ros_package
param.label: save_ros_package
param.hint: ROS package the save path is relative to

param.name: move_to_poses
param.label: move_to_poses
param.hint: Actually move the arm instead of using planned trajectory
